oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of John Houseal Thomson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Encased tintype of John Houseal Thomson, 1st S. C. Inf. (Hagood's) Regt., CSA. A native of Beaufort, S. C., Thomson died on the field of Manassas on August 30, 1862, leaving a widow, Eugenia Eliza Furse, and two young sons. See tsla124, tsla126, and tsla127 for images of John Houseal Thomson's brothers and mother.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
